unnormalised: Understanding state budgets is crucial for informed citizenry. Take Kerala, for example, their Onam bonus for government employees comes directly from budget allocations. Infrastructure projects like the Delhi-Meerut Expressway also rely on state and central funding. Analyzing budget documents from institutions like NITI Aayog can help us understand expenditure priorities. Rs. 5000 crores might seem large, but its impact depends on allocation. Different states, different biryani recipes, different budgets!
normalised: Understanding state budgets is crucial for informed citizenry. Take Kerala, for example, their Onam bonus for government employees comes directly from budget allocations. Infrastructure projects like the Delhi-Meerut Expressway also rely on state and central funding. Analyzing budget documents from institutions like N I T I Aayog can help us understand expenditure priorities. Rupee five thousand crore might seem large, but its impact depends on allocation. Different states, different biryani recipes, different budgets!
